entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -18.2°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
